titleStmt.title: A divine discoverie of death directing all people to a triumphant resurrection, and euer-lasting saluation.
titleStmt.author: Vaughan, Edward, preacher at St. Mary Woolnoth.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted [by R. Field] for William Iones [3] and Richard Boyle, dwelling in the Blackfriers,

notesStmt.note: Pages 94 and 179 repeated in number only.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
